name: BLACKEST FRIDAY
description:
Game made in 49 hours for the UNCC Game Dev club 49hr game jam.

In this game you play as a scalper trying to get expensive items on Black Friday to resell on Ebay to buy back your soul. Rip and tear through the Chads, Karens, and Grandmas to keep your soul.

There is a known bug where the first item is not explicitly named. Any item is valid at this stage. Bring items to the entrance to claim them.

This game was made by:

Chris (me) - Programmer

Jon - Artist 

Tyler - Music and Sound
